articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Crackdown on Pro-reunification Organization Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Crackdown on Pro-reunification Organization Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) in a statement on July 3 termed the Lee Myung Bak group's vicious crackdown on the South Headquarters of Pomminryon an anti-reunification criminal act of negating the inter-Korean declarations and blocking national reconciliation and unity and another grave provocation to fellow countrymen. 
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak has recently instructed the puppet prosecution to announce the so-called "results of investigation into cases of the violation of the 'National Security Law'" and take such a fascist action as finally detaining three leading members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon including its Chairman Ri Kyu Jae, the statement noted, and went on:  
					
					 This once again laid bare the criminal design of the Lee Myung Bak group to totally eliminate the above-said headquarters and quell the daily growing desire for achieving reunification through an alliance with the north in south Korea, 
					
					 The above-said "results of investigation" are nothing but far-fetched ones as they are peppered with sheer lies, fabrications and plots from A to Z.  
					
					 Recalling that the Lee group has been thrown into a serious ruling crisis by the massive resistance of the south Koreans against its submission to foreign forces, confrontation with fellow countrymen and misrule, the statement accused the group of seeking to find out a way out of this in cooking up cases of violations of the NSL by linking them with the north in a bid to fan up the consciousness of the confrontation with it and strengthen the fascist dictatorial system. 
					
					 The statement urged the Lee Myung Bak group to immediately halt the fascist crackdown on the pro-reunification movement organizations and release at once the unreasonably detained members of the said headquarters, deeply mindful that its escalated fascist suppression and confrontation with fellow countrymen would only precipitate its own self-destruction.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Rwandan President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Rwandan President 
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on June 29 sent a message of greetings to President of Rwanda Paul Kagame on the occasion of the national day of Rwanda.
					The President in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Rwanda would continue to favorably develop in the future, too, wishing the President and people of Rwanda successes in their work to consolidate national unity and achieve the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Belorussian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Belorussian President
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a message of greetings to Aleksandr Grigoriyevich Lukashenko, President of Belarus, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished the President success in his work for the progress and prosperity of the country and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Belarus would develop on good terms.

articles.title: DPRK Proves Successful in 2009 Asian Youth Games
articles.content:
DPRK Proves Successful in 2009 Asian Youth Games
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Gum of the DPRK bagged a gold medal in the 2009 Asian Youth Games going on in Singapore.
					 She made a record of 12.34m in the triple jump of women's track and field events held on July 1.

articles.title: Inorganic Waterproof Agent
articles.content:
Inorganic Waterproof Agent
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- An inorganic waterproof agent developed at Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering is drawing interest of people.
					 The inorganic waterproof powder, made of raw materials abundant in the country, has not aging phenomena of other waterproof agents such as formation of crack and lowering of adhesive strength after an elapse of a certain time.
					
					 As it is watertight under any ground pressure, it is recognized as an essential one for the construction of underground structures.
					
					 In the aspects of water-resistant effect and construction, the inorganic waterproof agent is superior to the existing organic waterproof agents.
					
					 For its economic effectiveness, the inorganic waterproof agent is being introduced into various sectors of the national economy in a big way.

articles.title: Noninvasive Cardiocerebrovascularorap
articles.content:
Noninvasive Cardiocerebrovascularorap 
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The noninvasive cardiocerebrovascularorap was developed in the DPRK, drawing interests of experts.
					 The diagnostic device made with advanced technology makes it possible to predict possible cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases in noninvasive way.
					
					 It can correctly diagnose the outbreak time of such incurable diseases as brain infarction and myocardial infarction and the morbid aging state.
					
					 As it is simple to handle and the diagnosing time is short, the device is applicable both to special hospital and family.
					
					 The device, the accuracy of which had been confirmed through adequate clinical tests, was highly appreciated in the 12th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair.

articles.title: Reliable Center for Training Talented Agricultural Technicians
articles.content:
Reliable Center for Training Talented Agricultural Technicians
Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Wonsan University of Agriculture in Kangwon Province, DPRK is a pedigree farm for training agricultural technicians.
					The university, instituted as the first of its kind in Korea under the warm care of President Kim Il Sung, is a reliable centre for raising talented agricultural technicians of the country.
					
					The monument to field guidance of the President stands in the university compound covered with greenery and thick woods and it has many school buildings, graduate school, agricultural scientific research institute, practice farm, greenhouse, etc.
					
					Displayed in its education and science exhibition hall and room devoted to conception built in a peculiar manner are lots of exhibits showing achievements made by its teachers and students in education and scientific researches in the past.
					
					An ultra-modern soil-type pollution-free greenhouse was built for the teaching staff and students under the warm care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and hundreds of thousands of trees of more than 250 good-species constitute a thick forest. Among the trees are Wonsan Sciadotitys verticillata, zelkova tree, Picea Koraiensis and juniper tree.
					
					He visited the university twice this year alone.
					
					He highly appreciated the feats performed by the university, saying that over the last more than 60 years it has produced many able scientists and technicians including academicians, candidate academicians, doctors and agricultural experts, thus making a great contribution to the development of the nation's agriculture.
					
					The university is registering big achievements in education and scientific researches so as to support with science and technology the Korean people in their vigorous strivings for building a great, prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the uplifted torch of a new revolutionary great upsurge.

articles.title: Invariable Revolutionary Mode of WPK
articles.content:
Invariable Revolutionary Mode of WPK
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- It is the invariable revolutionary mode of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to push ahead with the socialist construction by raising the role of the working class with the People's Army as the pillar.
					 The WPK thoroughly applies the mode of Songun politics to the leadership over the revolution and construction.
					
					 If one has a strong army and the working class, the core unit of the society, strives with redoubled efforts, one has nothing to fear in the world and can occupy any fortress. This principle has been proved throughout the history of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The People's Army has played a pivotal role in accomplishing the victory in the acute anti-imperialist confrontation whenever a grave trial befalls.
					
					 Typical is the fact that in the 1990s it smashed the anti-DPRK moves of the imperialist reactionary forces, defended socialism at the crossroads of survival and ruin and made a breach in the socialist construction, standing in the van of the endeavors to bridge over the economic difficulties.
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit prevalent among the soldiers has pervaded the whole country, bringing about a new turn in the revolution and construction.
					
					 The working class, which had built a socialist power on the debris of war and opened up the heyday of the Workers' Party era through the vigorous 70-day, 100-day and 200-day campaigns, triumphantly overcame the "Arduous March", consolidating the foundation of the independent national defence industry in the worst adversity.
					
					 It has thus brought about a new era for building a great, prosperous and powerful nation in the DPRK.
					
					 The working class is playing the role of a heroic vanguard and brave shock brigade in a general offensive for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 It is registering signal successes every day through forceful innovative 150-day campaign to make a breakthrough for building the thriving nation in all sectors of the national economy including electricity, coal, metal and railway transport.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Moves for Intensifying Fascist Dictatorship under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Moves for Intensifying Fascist Dictatorship under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak invited Pak Hui Thae, representative of the south Korean Grand National Party, and Ri Hoe Chang, president of the south Korean Liberal Progress Party, to "Chongwadae" where he let loose a whole string of jargons about "successes" made in his sycophantic and traitorous tour of the U.S.  He was also reported to have asked for "consensus of views on the present political situation in south Korea and "supra-partisan cooperation" in this regard. 
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The recent get-together arranged by Lee is a blatant challenge to the just struggle of the south Korean people as it was nothing but a move to intensify his fascist dictatorship in a bid to hold in check the advance of progressive forces and weather his ruling crisis.
					
					 Lee, seized with extreme uneasiness about his rule because of the movement for issuing "declarations on the situation" rapidly gaining in scope and strength throughout south Korea, seeks to further reinforce the fascist system of dictatorship, zealously  backed by the ultra-right conservative elements. 
					
					 A few days after the above-mentioned "event at the Chongwadae" Lee informally designated his confidants who displayed the fascist spirit in the past as new "public prosecutor general" and "chief of the Office of National Tax Administration," bringing to light his wicked aim to intensify the fascist dictatorship. 
					
					 The deplorable position of Lee was patently proved by the fact that he begged such politicians as Pak Hui Thae and Ri Hoe Chang who look more dead than alive for help in a bid to get rid of the present ruling crisis. No matter how desperately the traitor may work to tide over his ruling crisis, this will only give further momentum to the anti-"government" struggle of the south Korean people.

articles.title: Lee's Attempt to Mar Historic Significance of North-South Joint Declaration Blasted
articles.content:
Lee's Attempt to Mar Historic Significance of North-South Joint Declaration Blasted 
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- If the north-south relations are to be improved and the cause of the country's reunification is to be accomplished, it is necessary to thoroughly frustrate by the concerted efforts of the Koreans the criminal moves of the south Korean ruling forces to scrap the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, negating them. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is now revealing itself its true colors as a group of anti-reunification and confrontation-minded elements and a group of traitors to the nation by defiling the said joint declarations and playing down their historic significance. 
					
					 The group's moves to negate and scrap the said joint declarations have reached the worst phase. 
					
					 The gentries of the "Grand National Party" vied with each other to slander the joint declaration on June 15, the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. They let loose such a spate of vituperation that the historic Pyongyang meeting was the "talks that took place thanks to bribery" and played down the June 15 joint declaration as "no more than an event".
					
					 They also spread sheer rumors that the DPRK's nuclear activities were linked with the June 15 joint declaration by asserting that the "north conducted a nuclear test" in the wake of the publication of the declaration. 
					
					 The Lee group labeled the former regimes involved in adopting the joint declarations "leftist regimes" and the pro-reunification patriotic organizations and people supporting the joint declarations "leftist forces," pushing the inter-Korean relations to the worst crisis. 
					
					Not content with these moves, the group showed the sign of not ruling out even a war of aggression against the north, talking about the "invalidity" of the joint declarations. 
					
					 Intolerable are the moves of the Lee group to mar the historic significance of the joint declarations as they are harmful to the independent development of the nation, the peace of the country and the cause of the country's reunification.

articles.title: Adherence to Principle of Independence Called for
articles.content:
Adherence to Principle of Independence Called for
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Each country and nation should hold fast to the principle of independence and display strong spirit and will for independence and wage a dynamic struggle to frustrate the moves of the imperialists to realize their ambition for domination, depending upon the outdated international order. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 The experience and reality of the DPRK prove that a country is sure to emerge victorious when it holds fast to the principle of independence, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 This principle is based on the revolutionary faith and will.
					
					 For a country to claim that it fights against an imperialist formidable enemy without faith and will is no more than an empty slogan. Only when a country fights with firm faith and will can it adhere to the principle of independence and win victory, remaining undeterred by any threat and blackmail of the imperialists.
					
					 If a country is to stand firm against and win over the vicious imperialist forces it should have staunch fighting spirit that it can pull through any obstacle and blockade and unshakable courage and pluck that there is always a way out. One will not be able to stand the raging wind raised by imperialists and one's life will be hanged by a thread if one lacks them.
					
					 One should consider whatever one does as a right thing and make a bold decision on anything if it is for the sake of the nation and tenaciously implement it, not wavering or reading others' faces no matter what they may say.
					
					 What is important for maintaining the principle of independence is to bolster up the national defence capability, consolidate the foundations of the independent economy and strengthen unity.
					
					 The DPRK has dynamically advanced the socialist cause, the cause of Songun revolution, on the firm principle of independence.
					
					The hostile forces are now making desperate efforts to check the advance of the people of the DPRK while kicking up a racket of "sanctions" against it over its nuclear test for self-defence, but this would get them nowhere.
					
					 The moves of the enemies to bring down the DPRK and socialism are bound to meet failure and frustration in face of the DPRK which has held fast to the above-said principle.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's War Moves Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's War Moves Flayed
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held the 91st meeting for peace and disarmament outside the puppet Defence Ministry building on June 30, at which it denounced the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its frantic war moves for aggression.
					 The participants in the meeting said that on June 26 the "Defence Ministry" finally confirmed the adjustment bill on the "basic plan for defence reforms" and opened it to public through media.
					
					 The said bill contains plans for mounting preemptive attack upon the north and introducing the latest offensive weapons to the army, they pointed out.
					
					 They charged that it is a dangerous act of pushing the Korean Peninsula to the war disaster to call for preemptive attack on the north.
					
					 Condemning the "Defence Ministry" for threatening the people's lives and destroying peace under the signboard of "reforms," they demanded immediate repeal of the plan for preemptive attack on the north and prompt resignation of Ri Sang Hui, minister of "Defence."
					
					 They declared that all the people would fight against the Lee Myung Bak bellicose forces' war moves for aggression.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Fascist Suppression Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations made public statements on June 29 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group's fascist suppression.
					 The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions in a statement accused the police of forcibly taking away 16 leading members including the chairman of the south Korean Teachers Union (Jongyojo) who protested against the authorities' unreasonable crackdown on the participants in the movement for issuing declaration on the situation, adding that this clearly indicated Lee's violation of democracy has gone beyond danger line. 
					
					 What the teachers affiliated to Jongyojo protested in their declaration on the situation reflected their stand critical of Lee's self-righteous "state administration" and policy for stamping out the education and this has commanded sympathy among most of south Koreans, the statement noted. 
					
					 It urged the authorities to release the above-said arrestees and immediately retract the measures taken against those teachers who participated in the said movement.
					
					 A statement released by the Solidarity for Progress of South Korea demanded the Lee Myung Bak "government" stop watching and suppressing the above-mentioned teachers and withdraw at once the unreasonable disciplinary steps against them and measures to indict them.
					
					 A society of young people for implementing the June 15 joint declaration held in a statement that the authorities' arrest of the former chairman of the Seoul District Federation of University Student Councils under the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils who is a member of the society on June 24 is obviously an undisguised suppression of the movement of youth and students.   
					
					 The statement declared that the young people of this land would pool efforts with people from all walks of life desirous of democracy and wage an all-out struggle against the Lee Myung Bak regime in order to get the detainees released and frustrate the moves to intensify the suppression and have the "National Security Law" repealed.

articles.title: Signature Campaign for Impeachment of Lee Myung Bak Declared
articles.content:
Signature Campaign for Impeachment of Lee Myung Bak Declared
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Labor Party of south Korea declared that it would form a "headquarters of the movement for forcing the Lee Myung Bak regime to step down" and launch the signature campaign for impeachment against Lee.
					 A spokesman for the party clarified this stand at a press conference called at the "National Assembly" building on June 29.
					
					 He said that the party would sponsor meetings, information activities, lectures on the situation, etc. across south Korea to build up public opinion against Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 The party will successfully wage this campaign in solidarity with civic and public organizations and thus oust Lee from power without fail, the spokesman said.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Chinese
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Chinese
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Sheng Mingfu, president of the National Committee of the Agricultural and Forestry Workers Union of China, who visited the DPRK, praised President Kim Il Sung for having performed the immortal exploits for the times and history through his distinguished ideo-theoretical activities and gigantic revolutionary practices.
					 He said that Kim Il Sung devoted all his life to the liberation and prosperity of the country and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense.
					
					 Kim Il Sung is the great leader of the Korean people and a close friend of the Chinese people, he said, noting with high appreciation that he made enormous contributions to the world revolution and the international communist movement. 
					
					 Visiting the International Friendship Exhibition House, I keenly realized that Kim Il Sung is a peerlessly great man enjoying high praises from all people, he stressed.
					
					He noted that General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who is successfully carrying forward to completion the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung, has wisely led the Korean people.

articles.title: UNSC's Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Rejected
articles.content:
UNSC's Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Rejected
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on June 18 strongly denouncing the UNSC for having adopted, at the U.S. instigation, the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its second nuclear test.
					 The statement branded the "resolution" as a disgraceful thing contrary to the international laws and usage.
					
					 The UN acting under the control of the U.S. is being deprived of its legality and impartiality in realizing equality among countries and ensuring global peace and security, it pointed out.
					
					 The statement contended that the DPRK, a sovereign state, has the right to bolster up its nuclear deterrent in order to defend its sovereignty from challenges of imperialism.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK Slammed
						
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- A political party and an organization of Democratic Congo and Norway released statements on June 24 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo in its statement laid bare the purpose and illegality of the U.S. imperialists' occupation of south Korea and their true colors as the provoker of the Korean War.
					
					 Charging that the U.S. has reduced south Korea into its colony and is maneuvering to extremely aggravate the situation of the Korean Peninsula while turning down the just demand of the DPRK for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord, the statement said:
					
					 We hold that the U.S. should withdraw all its aggression armed forces from south Korea without delay and Korea's reunification should be achieved in the spirit of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Proceeding from the principle of impartiality, the United Nations should make every possible effort so that Korea's reunification can be realized by the Korean people themselves.
					
					 The Friendship Society Norway-Korea in its statement accused the U.S. imperialists of having driven the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war by instigating the UN Security Council to adopt the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 Bitterly condemning the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, the statement demanded the unconditional repeal of the "resolution".
					
					 Meanwhile, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, in their joint statement issued on the occasion of the month for international solidarity with the Korean people on June 25, held that the U.S. imperialists should immediately get out of south Korea and stop their pressure upon the DPRK.

articles.title: Special Issue of Bulletin Issued by Czech Organization
articles.content:
Special Issue of Bulletin Issued by Czech Organization
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association published a special issue of its bulletin on June 20.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Leader of people" said that 15 years have passed since the demise of President Kim Il Sung but the Korean people are always holding him in high esteem and boundlessly revering him. 
					
					 It went on to say:
					
					 All the people absolutely trust their leader and are closely united around him. Herein lies the important secret of the DPRK's conversion into an invincible socialist power.
					
					 The great feats performed by the President will shine forever and he will always live in the hearts of the world progressive humankind. 
					
					 In an article titled "15 years after demise of President Kim Il Sung" the bulletin noted that the Korean people have been working hard to implement the President's lifetime intention and that what he intended and desired has been brought into reality. 
					
					 The bulletin also introduced in detail the revolutionary career of   Kim Hyong Jik, outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea who devoted all his life to the struggle for the independence of the country, saying that July 10 marks the 115th anniversary of his birth. 
					
					Another article of the bulletin praised the immortal exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il for the strengthening and development of the Workers' Party of Korea and the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation over the past 45 years.

articles.title: Contacto de trabajo Norte-Sur para enmienda del contrato de ZIK
articles.content:
Contacto de trabajo Norte-Sur para enmienda del contrato de ZIK
Pyongyang, 3 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar la vispera en Kaesong el contacto de trabajo entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea para la enmienda del contrato de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK).
					La parte Norte expreso su lastima por el estancamiento de esta cita a pesar de sus sinceros esfuerzos como el planteamiento en los anteriores contactos de las iniciativas constructivas dirigidas a revisar y renegociar la gestion de la ZIK conforme a las actuales relaciones cambiadas N-S.
					
					Ante todo, aconsejo a su contraparte que no haga cosas que puedan obstaculizar el contacto.
					
					Prosiguio que en la parte Sur siguen reportando hechos desagradables y desafiantes al contacto, se libra una feroz campana de "sancion" y se pronuncian uno tras otro los discursos malsanos en pro de la confrontacion entre los regimenes.
					
					Para colmo, se difunde el "plan principal de la reforma de defensa nacional", que supone el "ataque preventivo" y el "estado emergente", preciso la parte Norte.
					
					Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que hasta las propias autoridades del "Ministerio de Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea envenenan el clima del contacto hablando de la teoria de "desnuclearizacion, apertura, 3000 US$" y "enfrentamiento rotundo", critico.
					
					El procedimiento de la parte Sur, que nos habla frente a frente del "dialogo" y "sinceridad" y a las espaldas, fomenta la confrontacion, nos obliga a preguntarle si tiene o no la voluntad de seguir sosteniendo el contacto de trabajo, objeto.
					
					Es imprescindible adoptar la posicion y actitud sinceras en el debate de los problemas relativos a la enmienda del contrato de la ZIK, ratifico.
					
					Desde el principio, la parte Sur viene rehusando nuestra propuesta sin justos motivos ni estudiarla profundamente partiendo de su actitud insincera en cuanto al contacto y lo complica presentando problemas que no tienen nada que ver con esta cita, revelo.
					
					Ademas, difunde abiertamente el rumor del "cierre" de la ZIK y cunden entre algunas autoridades unas palabras tan irracionales como "no dialogar como antes" que significa, en su esencia, hacer el contacto para la confrontacion, denuncio.
					
					Entonces, para que sirve este contacto de trabajo, se pregunto e insistio en que la parte Sur debe dejar de cometer lo que contraviene a la aspiracion y la esperanza de la nacion.
					
					Dado que hemos formulado en los anteriores contactos los proyectos globales sobre la enmienda del contrato de la ZIK, proponemos debatir primero en esta ocasion el arriendo de la tierra, lo mas prioritario y basico de nuestros proyectos, senalo.
					
					Se refirio al proposito y a lo razonable de nuestra propuesta sobre ese tema.
					
					Demando a la parte Sur estudiar con seriedad nuestra propuesta y aceptarla sinceramente destacando que la norma del arriendo de la tierra, presentada por nuestra parte, no es alta en ningun caso si se tiene en cuenta en sentido general los antecedentes de las zonas industriales del Sur de Corea y otros paises y las peculiaridades, el valor y las perspectivas de la ZIK.
					
					Exigio responder con buena fe a la sinceridad y con indulgencia a la magnanimidad expresando una vez mas su voluntad de resolver los problemas, que tienen las empresas surcoreanas en sus negocios, a medida que vaya resolviendo el problema del arriendo de la tierra.
					
					Sin embargo, la parte Sur se mostro evasiva al debate de ese problema basico y rehuso obstinadamente nuestra justa demanda utilizando argumentos absurdisimos.
					
					De mal en peor, dijo sin escrupulos que no ha tenido prerrogativas en la ZIK hasta ahora.
					
					La parte Norte reprocho categoricamente y cuestiono seriamente la actitud grosera e insincera de la parte Sur calificandola como provocacion intencional y premeditada para llevar al fracaso el presente contacto.
					
					Concluyo enfatizando que el futuro del contacto y de las labores de la ZIK dependen enteramente de la actitud de la parte surcoreana.

articles.title: APRP denuncia represion fascista de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
APRP denuncia represion fascista de banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 3 de julio (ATCC) -- El portavoz de la direccion nortena de la Alianza Pannacional para la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) publico este viernes una declaracion que califica la brutal represion de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea contra la direccion surena de la APRP de acto anti-reunificacion dirigido a negar las declaraciones aprobadas entre ambas partes coreanas e impedir la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y de otra grave provocacion a la connacional Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Recientemente, el traidor Lee Myung Bak publico por conducto de la fiscalia titere surcoreana el "resultado de investigacion de los casos de violacion de la Ley de Seguridad" y encarcelo al fin y al cabo al presidente Ri Kyu Jae y otros dos miembros medulares de la direccion surena de la APRP, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Esta accion fascista vuelve a demostrar el intento criminal de la banda de Lee de disolver completamente la entidad senalada y sofocar el clima a favor de la reunificacion en alianza con el Norte de Corea, que se hace cada dia mas fuerte en el Sur de Corea.
					
					 Ese recien publicado "resultado de investigacion" esta penetrado de punta a cabo de fraudes, falsificaciones, intrigas y argumentos absurdos.
					
					  Hoy dia, la camarilla de Lee esta caida en la seria crisis de gobernacion ante la protesta masiva de los habitantes surcoreanos sumamente indignados por el servilismo a las fuerzas extranjeras, la confrontacion fratricida y las politicas antipopulares de aquella.
					
					  Por eso, busca la salida en fomentar la conciencia conflictiva con la RPDC inventando los "casos de violacion de la Ley de Seguridad" en que supuestamente este involucrada ella y en consolidar el sistema de dictadura fascista.
					
					  Esa horda de traidores debe saber que mientras recurra mas a la represion fascista y a la confrontacion fratricida, le llegara mas pronto el dia de su autodestruccion.
					
					  Sobre todo, debe parar ahora mismo la represion fascista contra las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion y poner inmediatamente en libertad a los miembros encarcelados de la direccion surena de la APRP.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia al traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia al traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 3 de julio (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el traidor Lee Myung Bak invito al representante del "Gran Partido Nacional", Pak Hui Thae, y al presidente del "Partido Progresivo Liberal", Ri Hoe Chang, a "Chongwadae" (casa azul) donde al cabo de hablar excesivamente de los "exitos" alcanzados durante su visita humillante y antinacional a Estados Unidos les mendigo "recogida de opiniones publicas" y "cooperacion superpartidista" en relacion con la actual crisis politica creada en el Sur de Corea.
					La presente "invitacion" de Lee constituye una campana por fortalecer la dictadura fascista tendente a detener el avance de las fuerzas progresistas y salir de la crisis de su gobernacion y un desafio frontal a la lucha justa de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					Atemorizado por la crisis de su dominacion ante la campana de "declaracion sobre la situacion" que se expande bruscamente a toda la extension surcoreana, la banda Lee intenta intensificar el sistema de la dictadura fascista bajo el activo apoyo de los elementos conservadores ultraderechistas.
					
					Poco despues, el traidor Lee designo a los personajes cercanos que demostraron el temperamento fascista en el pasado como nuevo "procurador general" y nuevo "titular de la Direccion General de Impuesto", con lo cual revelo abiertamente su intencion siniestra de fortalecer la dictadura fascista.
					
					De veras, es muy lamentable la posicion de MB quien pidio a los dos cadaveres politicos arriba mencionados el "apoyo" para liberarse de la crisis de su gobernacion. 
					
					Cuanto mas perversamente actua para liberarse de tal crisis tanto mas se avivaran las llamas de la lucha "antigubernamental" de los surcoreanos.

articles.title: Base de formacion de personal tecnico de agricultura
articles.content:
Base de formacion de personal  tecnico de agricultura
Pyongyang, 3 de julio (ATCC) -- En la provincia de Kangwon de Corea se encuentra la Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan, centro genetico que forma a los tecnicos agricolas.
					  Este plantel docente es la primera universidad de la tecnica agricola del pueblo en Corea fundada por la direccion minuciosa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la firme base para la formacion del personal  tecnico  de agricultura del pais.
					
					  En el recinto de la universidad cubierto de frondosos arboles esta erguido el monumento a la visita de orientacion del Presidente y el plantel esta compuesto por varios edificios escolares, el instituto doctoral, el instituto de ciencia agricola, la granja de practica, el invernadero, etc.
					
					  En la exposicion permanente de educacion y ciencias y el pabellon de sugestion especificamente construido estan exhibidos numerosos articulos que dan a conocer los exitos de los profesores, empleados y estudiantes logrados en la labor docente, investigacion cientifica en el pasado.
					
					  Sobre todo, la universidad cuenta con el invernadero libre de contaminacion del tipo de suelo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il preparo para los profesores, empleados y estudiantes, y el bosque frondoso donde crecen cientos de miles de arboles de buena variedad de mas de 250 variedades, entre ellos,  Sciadopitys verticillata de Wonsan, Zelkova serrata, Picea koyamai y Sabina chinesis.
					
					  Este ano el Dirigente visito en 2 veces esta universidad.
					
					  El Dirigente dijo que la Universidad de Agricultura de Wonsan con la larga historia formo  un gran numero de competentes cientificos y tecnicos incluyendo academicos, candidatos al academico, doctores y especialistas en la agricultura durante mas de 60 anos y contribuyo grandemente al desarrollo agricola del pais y evaluo en alto los meritos de la universidad.
					
					Este plantel docente logra grandes exitos en la labor docente y la investigacion cientifica apoyando con ciencias y tecnicas la solemne lucha del pueblo coreano por la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista enarbolando la antorcha del nuevo y gran auge revolucionario.
